Job Title: Senior Business Analyst - Local to Houston TX or Chicago IL - W2 - (TQR)

Location: Houston, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Global Force USA, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!

Role: Senior Business Analyst Candidate must be local to Houston TX or Chicago IL

Duration: 12-month contract to hire - w2 

Location: Houston, TX or Chicago, IL (hybrid, 1x per week onsite with potential paid travel)

Our client is looking for a Senior Business Analyst with airline experience. The program this person will be supporting is focused on the airline reservation system, which is key knowledge that will be necessary for success in this role. Additionally, knowledge about HOT files and ECR files would be a very big nice to have for this candidate.

OVERVIEW/SUMMARY

Supports development and implementation of solutions to improve processes for below-the-wing activities and airport tools. Successful candidates will work collaboratively across the organization, including the operational teams in the field, to ensure project and initiatives are executable for frontline teams. This role includes experiences across the ramp airport journey, including planeside, transfer and sortation of bags, and during IRROPs scenarios.

ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES

Collaboratively support key projects that improve the employee experience and drive customer satisfaction within the airport experienceDesign and deliver solutions that bring an innovative approach and consider practical limitationsManage project timeline and budget commitments effectivelySupport testing strategy for new processes and toolsKeep leadership informed of project health through regular status updates and contribute in the development of executive level presentationsRegularly spend time in the field to gauge operational needs and build relationships with AO leaders to ensure priorities are appropriately alignedCollaborate with training, change management, and communications teams to develop and deploy informative and actionable materials to support project updates and deployments

TRAVEL

International travel required

KNOWLEDGE

Airport Operations

SKILLS/ ABILITIES

Required:

Strong verbal and written communication skillsMicrosoft Office and analytical skillsDemonstrate agility managing through ambiguity and be adaptable in the face of changeStrong business acumen

Preferred:

Demonstrated project planning and execution

Required

Bachelor's Degree or equivalent work experience

Required

2+ years of airlines operations experience and/or project management experience6+ years of business analysis experience2+ years of reservation system experience

Senior Business Analyst - Local to Houston TX or Chicago IL - W2 - (TQR)

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
